attributes.name: Aegis Vitrioulsor
attributes.description: "It is said it took three months, and the destruction of four forges, to create this shield."
attributes.parsed_description: "It is said it took three months, and the destruction of four forges, to create this shield."

attributes.name: Aeternum's Rebirth
attributes.description: "This world shall be born again, better and stronger."
attributes.parsed_description: "This world shall be born again, better and stronger."

attributes.name: Ageless Blade
attributes.description: “Time has no effect on this weapon. It's as new as it was the day it was forged.”
attributes.parsed_description: “Time has no effect on this weapon. It's as new as it was the day it was forged.”

attributes.name: Agony
attributes.description: "At first, it will hurt. Then it will hurt more. There is nothing you can do."
attributes.parsed_description: "At first, it will hurt. Then it will hurt more. There is nothing you can do."

attributes.name: Alakazham's Incantation
attributes.description: "The mythical wizard was said to have blessed this hatchet with his power before bestowing it on a brave Ranger."
attributes.parsed_description: "The mythical wizard was said to have blessed this hatchet with his power before bestowing it on a brave Ranger."

attributes.name: Alchemical Safety Gloves
attributes.description: "Wearing proper hand protection is key when performing transmutations."
attributes.parsed_description: "Wearing proper hand protection is key when performing transmutations."

attributes.name: Alchemist's Pot Stirrer
attributes.description: "Just how big is the alchemical pot that requires a stirring rod this large? And why does this spear seem to soak up half of the reagents?"
attributes.parsed_description: "Just how big is the alchemical pot that requires a stirring rod this large? And why does this spear seem to soak up half of the reagents?"

attributes.name: Al'kazor
attributes.description: "The gem adorned hilt glistens as the rest of the blade seems to consume the light. What was once a righteous sword has now succumbed to pure corruption, just as its former master has."
attributes.parsed_description: "The gem adorned hilt glistens as the rest of the blade seems to consume the light. What was once a righteous sword has now succumbed to pure corruption, just as its former master has."

attributes.name: Alphabane

attributes.parsed_description: "Pure skill."

attributes.description: "This axe seems to have been left behind long ago."
